__e: Sometimes I think you'd rather be married to that place than to me.
I know you'd rather be with Daddy, but I'm trying my best.
I mean, I know you wanted to stay home, but come on, man. Is there any place you'd rather be right now?
And you'd rather not have someone on the agency payroll doing it.
And you should have someone else to talk to. Especially if there's anything, anything you'd prefer I didn't know about.
And I know you're proud of me, but I know that you wish I didn't do what I do.
- But... really, what would you rather be doing, preparing a patient or preparing for your wedding ?
Well, you have to, jackass, because there's more at stake here than what you'd rather do.
Okay, the night we hooked up, you told me you would rather try something and regret it than never try something.
I'm sure there are about a billion people you're rather be here with.
- Tell me you would rather have a woman than all this... power.
Sharon, look, I understand that moving in together is a big deal and that you would like some time to alert your children.
So wouldn't you rather stay in bed with me all day?
Maybe you really had rather be here, in the house yourew up in, with your mommy and daddy still taking care of you and John.
Tell her that you'd just sit home and watch TV and die, but you've got to go through the motions and try to save her daughter's life.
Someone you don't want to let see your face until you're ready to be seen.
Yeah, but, you know, knowing all you know now... and the horrors of battle, the rest of it... isn't that something you would rather have not experienced?

Is that the last thing that anyone needs, or is that the last thing that you need, because you refuse to come visit your only daughter in prison and you'd rather not have that weighing on your conscience for any longer than it has to?
